title: Sparkles of Hope
description: This is a collection of three children's short stories written and drawn in different earlier times.The first one-shot (Ola) talks about a girl who wants to see the spring fairies together with her grandpa. Will she manage to see them?The second story (My friend, Tree) talks about a tree in the front of a girl's house and their special relationship.The third story (When a star didn't shine one night) is about a little star who does not want to stay in the sky anymore because she is not too bright. She wants to go to Earth, but that makes her rethink her decision.
author: Stela Canga
